nodes.text: Grullbug was a male pirate of the Blazing Claw. He served under the pirate queen Gunda Mabin as part of the Bloody Bones crew. Grullbug killed several opponents during a raid against a Ghtroc star yacht on the Atrian Merchants' Causeway.
Grullbug was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide.
